languages.text: В странствиях с Вольным Торговцем Кассия Орселлио познала все тяготы и прелести окружающего мира. Бесценный опыт и новые знания помогли ей справиться с потаенными страхами и, наконец, принять себя и свои силы. Леди-Навигатор стала Новатором Дома, дабы искоренить последствия правления Тисифоны и последовавшей за ее исчезновением смуты. Весь срок своего правления она кропотливо трудилась над объединением враждующих ветвей Дома, заключала союзы и укрепляла влияние Орселлио.

In her journeys with the Rogue Trader, Cassia Orsellio experienced all the hardships and delights of the galaxy. The invaluable experience and new knowledge helped her to finally conquer her fears and accept herself and her powers. The Lady Navigator became Novator of her House, tasked with addressing the consequences of Tisiphone's rule and the chaos that followed her disappearance. For the duration of her reign, she patiently worked on uniting the feuding branches of the House, forging alliances and expanding the influence of House Orsellio.
languages.original_text: В странствиях с Вольным Торговцем Кассия Орселлио познала все тяготы и прелести окружающего мира. Бесценный опыт и новые знания помогли ей справиться с потаенными страхами и, наконец, принять себя и свои силы. Леди-Навигатор стала Новатором Дома, дабы искоренить последствия правления Тисифоны и последовавшей за ее исчезновением смуты. Весь срок своего правления она кропотливо трудилась над объединением враждующих ветвей Дома, заключала союзы и укрепляла влияние Орселлио.

traits.locale_text: In the journeys with the Rogue Trader Cassia Orsellio got to experience all the hardships and the delights of the world. Invaluable experience and new knowledge helped her to finally tackle her hidden fears and accept herself and her powers. The Lady Navigator became a Novator of the House to weed out the consequences of the Tisiphone's rule and the chaos that followed her disappearance. For the entire duration of her rule, she patiently worked on uniting the quarrelling branches of the House, making alliances and expanding the influence of House Orsellio.

languages.text: 与行商浪人的旅行期间，卡西娅·奥赛罗经历了银河系中各种各样的艰辛与欢乐。这些宝贵的经验与全新的知识帮助她克服了恐惧，接受了她自己与她的力量。卡西娅最终成为了家族的大族长，而她的任务就是解决提西福涅统治期间带来的恶果，以及她失踪之后造成的混乱。在卡西娅的统治期间，她耐心地将家族中彼此不和的分支重新团结起来，积极结交盟友，大大扩大了奥赛罗家族的影响力。
languages.original_text: In her journeys with the Rogue Trader, Cassia Orsellio experienced all the hardships and delights of the galaxy. The invaluable experience and new knowledge helped her to finally conquer her fears and accept herself and her powers. The Lady Navigator became Novator of her House, tasked with addressing the consequences of Tisiphone's rule and the chaos that followed her disappearance. For the duration of her reign, she patiently worked on uniting the feuding branches of the House, forging alliances and expanding the influence of House Orsellio.

traits.locale_text: 与行商浪人的旅行期间，卡西娅·奥塞罗经历了银河系中各种各样的艰辛与欢乐。这些宝贵的经验与全新的知识帮助她克服了恐惧，接受了她自己与她的力量。卡西娅最终成为了家族的大族长，而她的任务就是解决提西福涅统治期间带来的恶果，以及她失踪之后造成的混乱。在卡西娅的统治期间，她耐心地将家族中彼此不和的分支重新团结起来，积极结交盟友，大大扩大了奥塞罗家族的影响力。

languages.text: Auf ihren Reisen mit {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} erlebte Cassia Orsellio sämtliche Mühen und Verzückungen der Galaxie. Die wertvollen Erfahrungen und das neue Wissen halfen ihr, endlich ihre Ängste zu überwinden und sich selbst und ihre Kräfte zu akzeptieren. Die Lady Navigator wurde zur Novatorin ihres Hauses und musste mit den Konsequenzen von Tisiphones Herrschaft und dem Chaos nach deren Verschwinden fertigwerden. Während ihrer Herrschaft arbeitete sie geduldig daran, die verfehdeten Zweige des Hauses zu versöhnen, Bündnisse einzugehen und den Einfluss von Haus Orsellio auszuweiten.
languages.original_text: In her journeys with the Rogue Trader, Cassia Orsellio experienced all the hardships and delights of the galaxy. The invaluable experience and new knowledge helped her to finally conquer her fears and accept herself and her powers. The Lady Navigator became Novator of her House, tasked with addressing the consequences of Tisiphone's rule and the chaos that followed her disappearance. For the duration of her reign, she patiently worked on uniting the feuding branches of the House, forging alliances and expanding the influence of House Orsellio.

Die wertvollen Erfahrungen und das neue Wissen halfen ihr, endlich ihre Ängste zu überwinden und sich selbst und ihre Kräfte zu akzeptieren. Die Lady Navigator wurde zur Novatorin ihres Hauses und musste mit den Konsequenzen von Tisiphones Herrschaft und dem Chaos nach deren Verschwinden fertigwerden. Während ihrer Herrschaft arbeitete sie geduldig daran, die verfehdeten Zweige des Hauses zu versöhnen, Bündnisse einzugehen und den Einfluss von Haus Orsellio auszuweiten.

languages.text: Lors de ses voyages aux côtés {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, Cassia Orsellio découvrit les nombreux plaisirs et déplaisirs que la galaxie avait à lui offrir. Ces expériences inestimables l'aidèrent à vaincre ses peurs et à s'accepter elle-même ainsi que ses pouvoirs. Étant devenue la nouvelle Novator de sa maison, la navigatrice dut réparer les dégâts infligés par le règne de Tisiphone et contrecarrer le chaos engendré par sa disparition. Tout au long de son règne, elle œuvra patiemment pour unir les différentes branches de sa famille déchirée, nouant des alliances et étendant ainsi l'influence de la maison Orsellio.
languages.original_text: In her journeys with the Rogue Trader, Cassia Orsellio experienced all the hardships and delights of the galaxy. The invaluable experience and new knowledge helped her to finally conquer her fears and accept herself and her powers. The Lady Navigator became Novator of her House, tasked with addressing the consequences of Tisiphone's rule and the chaos that followed her disappearance. For the duration of her reign, she patiently worked on uniting the feuding branches of the House, forging alliances and expanding the influence of House Orsellio.

traits.locale_text: Lors de ses voyages aux côtés {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, Cassia Orsellio découvrit les nombreux plaisirs et déplaisirs que la galaxie avait à lui offrir. Ces expériences inestimables l'aidèrent à vaincre ses peurs et à s'accepter elle-même ainsi que ses pouvoirs. Après être devenue la nouvelle Novator de sa maison, la navigatrice dut réparer les dégâts infligés par le règne de Tisiphone et contrecarrer le chaos engendré par sa disparition. Tout au long de son règne, elle œuvra patiemment pour unir les différentes branches de sa famille déchirée, nouant des alliances et étendant ainsi l'influence de la maison Orsellio.

languages.text: Durante sus viajes con {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente, Cassia Orsellio experimentó todas las adversidades y placeres de la galaxia. Esa experiencia tan importante, junto con todo el conocimiento que adquirió, le permitió conquistar por fin sus miedos y aceptarse a sí misma y a sus poderes. La lady Navegante se convirtió en Novator de su casa, y cargó con la responsabilidad de hacer frente a las consecuencias del reinado de Tisiphone y el caos que siguió a su desaparición. Durante su mandato, trabajó con paciencia para unir a las ramas enfrentadas de la casa, forjando alianzas y expandiendo la influencia de la casa Orsellio.
languages.original_text: In her journeys with the Rogue Trader, Cassia Orsellio experienced all the hardships and delights of the galaxy. The invaluable experience and new knowledge helped her to finally conquer her fears and accept herself and her powers. The Lady Navigator became Novator of her House, tasked with addressing the consequences of Tisiphone's rule and the chaos that followed her disappearance. For the duration of her reign, she patiently worked on uniting the feuding branches of the House, forging alliances and expanding the influence of House Orsellio.

Esa experiencia tan importante, junto con todo el conocimiento que adquirió, le permitió conquistar por fin sus miedos y aceptarse a sí misma y a sus poderes. La Lady Navegante se convirtió en Novator de su casa, y cargó con la responsabilidad de hacer frente a las consecuencias del reinado de Tisiphone y el caos que siguió a su desaparición. Durante su mandato, trabajó con paciencia para unir a las ramas enfrentadas de la casa, forjando alianzas y expandiendo la influencia de la casa Orsellio.

languages.text: 自由開拓者との旅で、カシア・オーセリオは銀河系のあらゆる苦難と喜びを経験した。かけがえのない経験と新しい知識によって、彼女はついに恐怖を克服し、自分自身と自分の力を受け入れることができた。航宙士は、ティシフォンの支配と彼女の失踪に続いた混乱の結果に対処することを任務とする、オーセリオ家のノベイターとなった。統治期間中、彼女は忍耐強く、確執のあった分家をまとめ、同盟を結び、オーセリオ家の影響力を拡大することに努めた。
languages.original_text: In her journeys with the Rogue Trader, Cassia Orsellio experienced all the hardships and delights of the galaxy. The invaluable experience and new knowledge helped her to finally conquer her fears and accept herself and her powers. The Lady Navigator became Novator of her House, tasked with addressing the consequences of Tisiphone's rule and the chaos that followed her disappearance. For the duration of her reign, she patiently worked on uniting the feuding branches of the House, forging alliances and expanding the influence of House Orsellio.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者との旅で、カシア・オーセリオは銀河系のあらゆる苦難と喜びを経験した。かけがえのない経験と新しい知識によって、彼女はついに恐怖を克服し、自分自身と自分の力を受け入れることができた。航宙士は、ティシフォンの支配と彼女の失踪に続いた混乱の結果に対処することを任務とする、オーセリオ家のノベイターとなった。統治期間中、彼女は忍耐強く、確執のあった分家をまとめ、同盟を結び、オーセリオ家の影響力を拡大することに努めた。

languages.text: Cassia Orsellio, Hür Tacir'le yolculukları sırasında galaksinin sayısız zorluğunu ve güzelliğini deneyimledi. Bu değerli tecrübeler ve edindiği yeni bilgiler, korkularının üstesinden gelmesine ve hem kendisini hem de güçlerini kabullenmesine yardımcı oldu. Leydi Rotacı, Hanesinin Rota Reisi oldu. Sonrasında Tisiphone'nin hükümdarlığının yarattığı sorunlara ve yok oluşunu takip eden kaosa odaklandı. Hükümdarlığı sırasında Hane'nin çekişme hâlindeki dallarını bir araya getirmek, ittifaklar kurmak ve Orsellio Hanesi'nin nüfuzunu artırmak için sabırla mücadele etti.
languages.original_text: In her journeys with the Rogue Trader, Cassia Orsellio experienced all the hardships and delights of the galaxy. The invaluable experience and new knowledge helped her to finally conquer her fears and accept herself and her powers. The Lady Navigator became Novator of her House, tasked with addressing the consequences of Tisiphone's rule and the chaos that followed her disappearance. For the duration of her reign, she patiently worked on uniting the feuding branches of the House, forging alliances and expanding the influence of House Orsellio.

traits.locale_text: Cassia Orsellio, Hür Tacir'le yolculukları sırasında galaksinin sayısız zorluğunu ve sayısız güzelliğini deneyimledi. Bu değerli tecrübeler ve edindiği yeni bilgiler, korkularının üstesinden gelmesine ve kendini ve güçlerini kabullenmesine yardımcı oldu. Leydi Rotacı, Hane'sinin Rota Reisi oldu, Tisiphone'nin hükümdarlığından kaynakları sorunlara ve yok oluşunu takip eden kaosa odaklandı. Hükümdarlığı sırasında Hane'nin çekişme hâlindeki dallarını bir araya getirmek, ittifaklar kurmak ve Orsellio Hanesi'nin nüfuzunu artırmak için sabırla mücadele etti.
